name: Project Lockdown
description:
Project Lockdown.

Twenty years after the first Covid-19 outbreak you as a mercenary live in a city that is still constantly experiencing lockdown. You were hired to steal the cure from the most powerful company, the Arch Corp. The pharmaceutical company monopolizes vaccines and a cure for the disease but something seems strange in the middle of all this mess.

Notes:

This game was made as a project of a game develoment college.  It was made in a very short time due to the pandemic so it might be some bugs. It is for portfolio purposes only but your feedback are  very important to us. 

Game in ENG/US and PT/BR.
